Hero.subtitle: UNDERGROUND ELECTRONIC MUSIC CULTURE
Hero.text: Mallorca — Where the ego dissolves and only the rhythm remains.

Manifesto.subtitle: Our Philosophy
Manifesto.title: THE MANIFESTO
Manifesto.p1_1: MØRK is not just a party.
Manifesto.p1_2: It is a commitment to sound.
Manifesto.p2: A safe space where the ego dissolves and only the rhythm remains. We curate nights for the educated ear. Every beat, every light, every moment is crafted with intention.
Manifesto.p3: We believe in the power of underground culture. In the darkness, we find unity. In the repetition, we find transcendence. In the bass, we find ourselves.
Manifesto.p4: This is not entertainment. This is ritual.

Team.subtitle: THE FAMILY
Team.title: THE TEAM
Team.text: We are a family that believed in the project from the very start. Techno and club culture are not trends to us, but a way of life.

Sound.subtitle: Listen
Sound.title: THE SOUND
Sound.text: Immerse yourself in the MØRK sound. Play directly here.

Shop.title: The Shop
Shop.whatsapp_note: Orders are processed manually. Click to send your cart details to our team and arrange payment/shipping.

Footer.text: Underground electronic music culture in Mallorca. Pure techno, pure experience.
